ComicInfo.Title: The Return of Destroyer Duck
ComicInfo.Summary: The Return of Destroyer Duck: Dr. Brainard tries to control a number of freaks with electronic sitars
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 04:02:53. [Issue ID 59482]
ComicInfo.Characters: Destroyer Duck [Louis "Duke" Duck] [also as Specimen Q],Munchie,Tina Tuna,Undermind,Wildhair,Stallion] (first appearance of all except Brainard and Doris),Mr. Boyle (only appearance, death),The Industrial Accidents [Dr. Gregory Brainard (apparent death),Elf with a Gun [Relf] (unofficial),Howard the Duck clones (unofficial),Shard,Bush-Man,Nuggo the Gnome (first appearance),Switchblade,Poly Morphus,Needlenose (only appearance, death),Nurse Doris (apparent death),Lt. Frank Darling
